availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert C. Blain (1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Resident in Lincoln County in 1860. Second lieutenant and captain in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from October 28, 1861, to December 31, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, Etown, p. 124.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 20-21.
